Class YamlConfigurationSystem

  • java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • YamlConfigurationSystem

        public YamlConfigurationSystem()
        Creates a YAML configuration system with default settings.

      • YamlConfigurationSystem

        public YamlConfigurationSystem(java.lang.ThreadLocal<org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml> yaml)
        Creates a YAML configuration system.

        Example usage:

        YamlConfigurationSystem system = new YamlConfigurationSystem(
    new ThreadLocal<Yaml>() {

        @Override
        protected Yaml initialValue() {
            return new Yaml();
        }

    }
);
        Parameters:
        yaml - the ThreadLocal that provides a Yaml object
